### About
I received a BS degree in Molecular Biology from [University of California, San Diego](https://www.ucsd.edu/) in 2020. I am currently a second-year MPH student in Biostatistics at [Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health](https://www.publichealth.columbia.edu/). 

I am currently working with [Dr. R. Todd Ogden](https://www.publichealth.columbia.edu/people/our-faculty/to166) on functional data modeling of melatonin cycle.
